swarm.robot.helpers

Class MotionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • swarm.robot.helpers.MotionController

  • public class MotionController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that calculate the robot motions using mathematical models
    Author:
    Nuwan Jaliyagoda

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int speed,
                   double duration)
        Rotate the robot in given speed for a given duration
        Parameters:
        speed - the value for speed, [ROBOT_SPEED_MIN, ROBOT_SPEED_MAX]
        duration - the duration, in ms
        Throws:
        MotionControllerException

      • rotateRadians

        public void rotateRadians(int speed,
                          float radians)
        Rotate to a given relative angle in radians, with a given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - the value for speed, [ROBOT_SPEED_MIN, ROBOT_SPEED_MAX]
        degree - the relative degree to be rotate, positive means CW, [-180, 180]
        Throws:
        MotionControllerException

      • rotateDegree

        public void rotateDegree(int speed,

        Rotate to a given relative angle in degrees, with a given speed
        Parameters:
        speed - the value for speed, [ROBOT_SPEED_MIN, ROBOT_SPEED_MAX]
        degree - the relative degree to be rotated, positive means CW, [-180, 180]
        Throws:
        MotionControllerException

                         int distance)
        Move the robot by given speed for a given distance
        Parameters:

        distance - the distance as integer
        Throws:

      • moveDistance

        public void moveDistance(int speed,
                         double distance)
        Move the robot by given speed for a given distance
        Parameters:
        speed - the value for speed, [±ROBOT_SPEED_MIN, ±ROBOT_SPEED_MAX]
        distance - the distance as double, > 0
        Throws:
        MotionControllerException

      • move

        public void move(int leftSpeed,
                 int rightSpeed,
                 double duration)
        The core move implementation, using Dead Reckoning algorithm
        Parameters:
        leftSpeed - Left motor speed
        rightSpeed - Right motor speed
        duration - Duration, in ms
        Throws:
        MotionControllerException
